Module phpjavabridge

Package api.syntaxerror.phpjavabridge

PHP-Java-Bridge provides a TCP- or UDP-based connection between PHP (Client) and Java (Server)

    BridgeImpl
    PHP-Java-Bridge provides a TCP- or UDP-based connection between PHP (Client) and Java (Server)

    licensed under the Apache License 2.0:

    Permissions: Commercial use Modification Distribution Patent use Private use Limitiations: Trademark use Liability Warranty Conditions: License and copyright notice State changes License: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/LICENSE
    GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/
    Wiki: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/wiki
    JavaDocs (for /src/java): https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/javadoc/
    This class contains the Bridge-implementations for BridgeImpl.TCP and BridgeImpl.UDP
    BridgeImpl.TCP
    The Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) is a connection-based data transmission protocol

    Compared to BridgeImpl.UDP: reliable data transmission slower than UDP
    see the Wikipedia Article
    BridgeImpl.UDP
    The User Datagram Protocol (UDP) is a connectionless data transmission protocol

    Compared to BridgeImpl.TCP: faster than TCP unreliable
    see the Wikipedia Article
    Packet
    PHP-Java-Bridge provides a TCP- or UDP-based connection between PHP (Client) and Java (Server)

    licensed under the Apache License 2.0:

    Permissions: Commercial use Modification Distribution Patent use Private use Limitiations: Trademark use Liability Warranty Conditions: License and copyright notice State changes License: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/LICENSE
    GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/
    Wiki: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/wiki
    JavaDocs (for /src/java): https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/javadoc/
    A Packet is used to send and receive data.
    Currently, there are 14 differen data types supported: Available Data Types ID Name Read method Write method #0 boolean Packet.readBoolean() Packet.writeBoolean(boolean) #1 byte Packet.readByte() Packet.writeByte(byte) #2 unsigned byte Packet.readUnsignedByte() Packet.writeUnsignedByte(int) #3 short Packet.readShort() Packet.writeShort(short) #4 unsigned short Packet.readUnsignedShort() Packet.writeUnsignedShort(int) #5 int Packet.readInt() Packet.writeInt(int) #6 unsigned int Packet.readUnsignedInt() Packet.writeUnsignedInt(long) #7 long Packet.readLong() Packet.writeLong(long) #8 float Packet.readFloat() Packet.writeFloat(float) #9 double Packet.readDouble() Packet.writeDouble(double) #10 String (UTF-8) Packet.readStringUTF8() Packet.writeStringUTF8(String) #11 String (ASCII, optimized) Packet.readStringASCII() Packet.writeStringASCII(String) #12 String (C) Packet.readStringC() Packet.writeStringC(String) #13 byte[] Packet.readByteArray() Packet.writeByteArray(byte[])

    MalformedRequestException
    PHP-Java-Bridge provides a TCP- or UDP-based connection between PHP (Client) and Java (Server)

    licensed under the Apache License 2.0:

    SocketFailureException is thrown when a Packet couldn't be parsed
    SocketFailureException
    PHP-Java-Bridge provides a TCP- or UDP-based connection between PHP (Client) and Java (Server)

    licensed under the Apache License 2.0:

    Permissions: Commercial use Modification Distribution Patent use Private use Limitiations: Trademark use Liability Warranty Conditions: License and copyright notice State changes License: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/LICENSE
    GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/
    Wiki: https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/wiki
    JavaDocs (for /src/java): https://github.com/Synt4xErr0r4/PHP-Java-Bridge/blob/master/javadoc/
    SocketFailureException is thrown when an error occured while trying to communicate with a connected (PHP) client
